name: Qino
overview:
QINO Flagship AG is a quoted Swiss investment company offering international Web 2.0 exposure at the pre-IPO stage.

QINO Flagship has an outstanding investment track record and a unique strategic concept for future performance. Rather than pursuing a diversified portfolio, intense focus is placed on a select number of exciting, complementary investments.

Our success stems from our people’s diverse experience, backgrounds and expertise. Investment decisions are based upon an uncompromising belief in entrepreneurial values, a fundamental understanding of how capital markets work and experience of all development stages of technology businesses.

QINO Flagship AG’s Venture Capital 2.0 concept provides a service to entrepreneurs who have the potential to be (or who already are) backed by leading venture capitalists, in order to participate in the creation of entrepreneurial value during a project’s development stages. Our investment approach follows Web 2.0 paradigms and focuses primarily on social networking activities combined with smart profiling techniques and the systematic commercial exploitation of user-generated content.
